g.text: Sensors

remote sensing model to estimate surface flux in regional scale: physical background.
Sci in
China Ser. D.

method for obtaining surface soil water content and energy fluxes from remote measurements of
the Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) and surface radiant temperature.
Int. J.
Remote Sens.

vegetation index space for assessment of surface moisture status.
Remote Sens. Environ.

Measurement of Soil-Water Content.
Agric. For. Meteorol.

Sens.

Senegal River basin,
Remote Sens. Environ.

Remote Sens. Rev.

Remote Sens. Environ.

Remote Sens. Environ.

J. Appl.
Meteor.
